10:44 <vmassol> good morning  
10:44 <vmassol> I'd love to know what you think of http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1466 and whether you agree with my suggestion to modify SaveAction to support xredirect  
11:11 <woshilapin> has quit  
11:13 <gsmeria> has quit  
11:13 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
11:39 <vmassol> hmm seems we have a bug in 6.2.2: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AppWithinMinutes/DynamicMessageTool  
11:40 <vmassol> Utils.getComponentManager() seems to be retunring the Conetxt CM  
11:40 <vmassol> whereas it was returning the root CM before  
11:40 <vmassol> I don't remember when we made this change but it certainly broke a lot of places  
11:40 <vmassol> tmortagne: any idea?  
11:41 <vmassol> it would have better to not break backward compat  
11:42 <vmassol> maybe we should revert this  
11:42 <vmassol> especially since the method is marked deprecated  
11:43 <vmassol> hmm and getRootComponentManager() has also been deprecated  
11:45 <vmassol> even worse  
11:45 <vmassol> it seems that ComponentScriptService has also been modified  
11:45 <vmassol> to return the context CM  
11:46 <vmassol> so tmortagne what is the recommended way to register a component in groovy now? (without using a deprecated api)  
11:46 <tmortagne> vmassol: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10352  
11:46 <vmassol> yes and that's wrong  
11:46 <vmassol> you cannot write in it  
11:46 <vmassol> this is only for get  
11:46 <vmassol> not for write  
11:47 <tmortagne> using Utils#getComponent to access the CM never been the recommended way to access it  
11:47 <vmassol> it was  
11:48 <vmassol> it was even documtned as the way to do it  
11:48 <vmassol> :)  
11:48 <tmortagne> for groovy you introduce a script service a long time ago  
11:48 <vmassol> (from groovy)  
11:48 <vmassol> then we introduced the SS  
11:48 <vmassol> a long time after  
11:48 <vmassol> but now even this is broken  
11:48 <vmassol> :(  
11:48 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:49 <vrachieru> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <woshilapin> has quit  
11:52 <vmassol> tmortagne: creating jira issue  
11:55 <vmassol> tmortagne: XWIKI-11716  
11:59 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
12:04 <vmassol> ahhh I missed getComponentManager(namespace)!  
12:04 <vmassol> still...  
12:04 <vmassol> at least we have a way  
12:04 <vmassol> documenting it  
12:04 <vmassol> (a pity it wasn't done when added)  
12:08 <vmassol> tmortagne: not very nice to pass null to get the root cm
